title: Trigger Vercel redeploy - Add prefetch=false to Link comp... and 7 more
description: Trigger Vercel redeploy - Add prefetch=false to Link feature for better Vercel compatibility - Improve logging for configure button navigation. resolved configure button navigation using Link feature and improve admin redirect prevention - Replace router.push with Next.js Link feature for more reliable navigation - Add immediate admin check before any redirect logic runs - Add double-check inside timeout to prevent admin redirects - Increase timeout to 300ms for better user loading - Add comprehensive logging for debugging user role checks. resolved configure button redirect issue for admin users in Vercel - Add early return safeguard for admin users to prevent redirects - Improve redirect logic with better type checking and defensive coding - Add comprehensive logging for debugging user role checks - Enhance button click handler with better event handling and logging. resolved configure button navigation and admin redirect logic - Add proper event handling to configure button to prevent unintended redirects - resolved React hooks error by moving useEffect before conditional returns - Ensure admin users can access configure page without being redirected. Added missing generate-changelog.js script and make prebuild resilient. System Configuration with sub-navigation and project type management. Added Document Test feature for RAED accounts with project documents popup window, filtering, and version history. Implemented notification redirection with popup window and region-specific project notifications - Add clickable notifications that open project details popup window for RAED accounts - Generate notifications dynamically from actual projects in each region's project pool - Each RAED account now sees unique notifications based on their regional projects - Project names in notifications match actual projects from the project pool - Add notification highlight cards showing evaluator approvals, remarks, monitoring issues - Increase bell icon size for better visibility - Remove hardcoded notification templates in favor of dynamic generation.
